chunks.lyrics: Special Thanks goes to Rob T. for helping me out
p - pull off Suffixes for bend
t - tap f - full bend h - half bend
ph - pinched harmonic q - quarter bend t - tap bend
* - see comment ^ - Hold bend r release bend
, - slight palm mute () - ghost note, sustained note
Tuning A E A D F# B
Notes: This is just how I play it, my own interpretation so dont
Listen to CD for timing (tab spacing is often impreicse)
(Listen to CD for correct bending technique. The lower ghosted notes
are picked delicately, with the upper ghosted notes being the prev.
(Lower notes played by Second Guitar. Just play the high
notes, as these are prominent. And thats a full bend up to
twelfth fret, then released at the 11th fret pitch, then back
Notes: Pay attention to the palm muting.
